title: 510. What Problems Does Crypto Solve, Anyway?
description: Boosters say blockchain technology will usher in a brave new era of decentralization. Are they right — and would it be a dream or a nightmare? (Part 3 of "What Can Blockchain Do for You?")
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
